name.ja: ツイッターで大型画像

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets the large versions of images posted on Twitter.
short.ja: ツイッターで、大型画像をいつも使われるChromeの拡張機能です

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes the .jpeg_large and .png_large image extensions on Twitter to normal image extensions

THIS IS A MODIFICATION OF "Twitter Large Images" by Mike / マイク
HIS VERSION CHANGES THE LARGE VERSIONS TO .orig VERSIONS, I MADE VERY SMALL CHANGES TO CHANGE THIS
